SELECT
A.NICKNAME
B.RAI_NICKNAME
FROM MEMBER A
JOIN FUNDRAISER B ON (A.MEM_CODE = B.RAISER_CODE)
WHERE A.MEM_CODE = #{ memberNo }

SELECT MESSAGE_CODE, BOX_TYPE, MEM_CODE, TITLE, RECEIVED_TIME, SENTBY, CONTENT, IS_READ, IS_DELETED FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS NO, MESSAGE_CODE, BOX_TYPE, MEM_CODE, TITLE, RECEIVED_TIME, SENTBY, CONTENT, IS_READ, IS_DELETED FROM MESSAGES WHERE IS_DELETED = 'N' AND MEM_CODE = #{ memberNo } AND BOX_TYPE = #{ messageboxNo }) WHERE NO >= #{ selectCriteria.startRow } AND NO <= #{ selectCriteria.endRow } ORDER BY MESSAGE_CODE DESC
SELECT MESSAGE_CODE, BOX_TYPE, MEM_CODE, TITLE, RECEIVED_TIME, SENTBY, CONTENT, IS_READ, IS_DELETED FROM MESSAGES WHERE MESSAGE_CODE = #{ messageNo } AND IS_DELETED = 'N'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER.NICKNAME = #{ nickname }
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FUNDRAISER WHERE FUNDRAISER.RAI_NICKNAME = #{ nickname }
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MESSAGES ( MESSAGE_CODE, BOX_TYPE, MEM_CODE, TITLE, RECEIVED_TIME, SENTBY, CONTENT, IS_READ, IS_DELETED ) VALUES ( SEQ_MESSAGE_CODE.NEXTVAL, #{ message.boxType }, #{ message.receiverMemberNo}, #{ message.messageTitle }, SYSDATE, #{ message.senderNickname }, #{ message.messageContent }, 'N', 'N' )
